roleset.name: transform
roleset.note: CHANGE-V NOTES: "Start state" and "thing changing" are usually the same, but there canbe cases where they are separate. Reserve use of Arg3 for these cases. (from change.01-v)
CHANGE-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry change.01. VerbNet classes 26.6.1 45.4. (from change.01-n)

roles.note: "Start state" and "thing changing" are usually the same, but there canbe cases where they are separate. Reserve use of Arg3 for these cases. (from change.01-n)

example.name: change-v: agentive
example.text: The commercial changed the dynamics of the campaign.

example.name: change-v: ergative
example.text: ...customers whose addresses have changed during the past 3 1/2 years.

example.name: change-v: passive
example.text: ...[the areas]-1 that can be most easily changed *trace*-1

example.name: change-v: with end state
example.text: ...erasures changed wrong answers to right ones on a statewide test.

example.name: change-v: explicit start state
example.text: Customers change from borrowers to savers/investors.

example.name: make_change-l
example.text: Now , did there come a time when you learned that the board had made a change to the biology curriculum ?

example.name: change-n: Question: with args 2 & 3
example.text: What is the change from liquid to solid called?

example.name: change-n: All arguments...depressing
example.text: Standard& Poor's (S & P) announced their change to the debt outlook of United States from 'stable' to 'negative.'
example.arg: to the debt outlook of United States
